basicInfo.name: Daisy
basicInfo.flavor: \"Have you ever seen crimson butterflies light up the night sky? Unlike moths that fly into fire to die, these butterflies become fire and death, then fly back to you.\

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Dancing Fan
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 270% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals damage equal to 20% of the target's Max HP 1 time(s). (HP-based damage limited to 350% of caster's Attack.)
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 330% of Magic Attack.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Increases Damage: To 26% of the target's Max HP. (HP-based damage limited to 700% of caster's Attack)

Skill 2.name: Butterfly Flames
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
 - Deals damage equal to 130% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Magic Attack Boost to 33%.
 - Increases Damage: To 155% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Nimble Steps
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Petrify Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Petrify Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 2 Allies with the Highest Attack
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Always Active].
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Magic Attack Boost to 27%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - All Allies
 - Adds Effect: Barrier equal to 55% of Magic Attack upon activating a skill 2 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Ace, Jin, people of the Moonlit Isles, bright personalities, hard work, pork ramen
profile.dislikes: Ace's enemies, disloyal followers, fishy food

basicInfo.name: Daisy
basicInfo.flavor: The Moonlight Guards are also known as soldiers of the night. Naturally, the ninjas of the Moonlight Guards address Daisy as the Ruler of the Night. She doesn't seem to mind.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 245% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals damage equal to 16% of the target's Max HP 1 time(s). (HP-based damage limited to 300% of caster's Attack.)
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Nimble Steps
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Petrify Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Petrify Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 2 Allies with the Highest Attack
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Always Active].

basicInfo.name: Daisy
basicInfo.flavor: Daisy is Ace's older sister and the leader of the Moonlight Guard. She studied yin-yang arts and ninjutsu to protect her little brother.

Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
